Header.Name: Easylink
Header.Subject: TCOMNET Interconnect
Header.Suggestion: In VAN Setup task, add a note "Email sent to Easylink" and mark it as completed.

ScribTemplate.Template: Easylink Support,[$$:BR][$$:BR][$:CUSTOMER_NAME] (EDI ID: Qual=[$:CUSTOMER_QUALIFIER] ID=[$:CUSTOMER_EDI_ID]) will be exchanging EDI transactions through TrueCommerce's interconnect called TCOMNET with [$:PARTNER_NAME] (EDI ID: Qual=[$:PARTNER_QUALIFIER] ID=[$:PARTNER_EDI_ID]). Please let me know when you have this EDI relationship defined on your network.[$$:BR][$$:BR]Thank you!
